description: 现在完成时表示过去发生的动作对现在造成的影响或结果，或表示从过去开始持续到现在的动作或状态

explanation.basic_structure: 主语 + have/has + 过去分词 + ...
formation_rules: 规则动词与过去式相同：work → worked, play → played
不规则动词需要记忆：go → gone, see → seen, do → done, eat → eaten
第一人称单数用have，第三人称单数用has
usage_cases: 表示过去发生对现在的影响：I have finished my homework. (作业写完了，现在可以玩了)
表示从过去持续到现在的动作：She has lived here for ten years. (她在这里住了十年，现在还住着)
表示经历：I have been to Beijing. (我去过北京，有这个经历)
time_adverbs: already, yet, just, ever, never, before
for + 时间段, since + 时间点
recently, lately, so far, up to now
explanation.negative_form: 主语 + haven't/hasn't + 过去分词 + ...
explanation.question_form: Have/Has + 主语 + 过去分词 + ...?
common_errors: I have went to Beijing. (错误) → I have gone to Beijing. (正确)
She has lived here since ten years. (错误) → She has lived here for ten years. (正确)
I have finished my homework yesterday. (错误) → I finished my homework yesterday. (正确)
usage_tips: 现在完成时不能与表示过去具体时间的状语连用
for + 时间段，since + 时间点
注意区分现在完成时和一般过去时

basic_usage: I have already finished my homework.
She has lived in London since 2010.
We have known each other for five years.
Have you ever been to Japan?
He hasn't seen this movie yet.
I have never seen such a beautiful sunset.
She has worked here for three years.
We have studied English since primary school.
Have you finished your report yet?
with_time_adverbs: She hasn't finished her homework yet.
They have just left the office.
Have you ever been to Paris?
I have never seen such a beautiful flower.
We have known each other for ten years.
I have recently started learning French.
He has lately been very busy.
So far, I have completed three projects.
negative_sentences: I haven't finished my homework yet.
She hasn't been to Japan before.
They haven't seen the movie yet.
We haven't met each other for a long time.
questions: How long have you lived here?

learning_objectives: 掌握现在完成时的基本构成和用法
能够正确使用have/has + 过去分词
了解现在完成时与一般过去时的区别
能够在实际语境中正确使用现在完成时

assessment_criteria.good: 基本掌握现在完成时用法，偶有错误
assessment_criteria.satisfactory: 了解现在完成时基本用法，需要加强练习
